title: mvn build fails with 503 service unavailable when downloading org.fusesource.jansi:jansi:jar:1.18
body:
### Describe the bug

Build fails when running ./mvnw clean package with 
```
Unresolveable build extension: Plugin io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.9.1.Final or one of its dependencies could not be resolved: The following artifacts could not be resolved: io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.9.1.Final, org.fusesource.jansi:jansi:jar:1.18: Could not transfer artifact io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.9.1.Final from/to central (https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2): transfer failed for https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/io/quarkus/platform/quarkus-maven-plugin/2.9.1.Final/quarkus-maven-plugin-2.9.1.Final.jar, status: 503 Service Unavailable
```

This was working fine two days back. 

### Expected behavior

Dependency jar org.fusesource.jansi:jansi:jar:1.18 downloads should not fail. 

### Actual behavior

```
Unresolveable build extension: Plugin io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.9.1.Final or one of its dependencies could not be resolved: The following artifacts could not be resolved: io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.9.1.Final, org.fusesource.jansi:jansi:jar:1.18: Could not transfer artifact io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:jar:2.9.1.Final from/to central (https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2): transfer failed for https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/io/quarkus/platform/quarkus-maven-plugin/2.9.1.Final/quarkus-maven-plugin-2.9.1.Final.jar, status: 503 Service Unavailable
```

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

Java version: 11.0.15, vendor: Homebrew, runtime: /opt/homebrew/Cellar/openjdk@11/11.0.14.1/libexec/openjdk.jdk/Contents/Home
Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8
